Description.Name: The Scorpion's Nest
Description.Details: Not wanting to go himself or risk his own men, Helmar Valasek of Santander's Killers infamy has tasked his newest Mercenary employees, Wilson's Hussars, to set up a new branch of operation in the Periphery. Giving them the honor of spreading his influence by raiding Kurita assets for water, grain as well as 'Mech and vehicle parts. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has tasked you with denying his ambitions, permanently. Track down these pirates and finish them for good.

FlashpointShortDescription: The Kurita Representatives needs to stop an ambitious operation by Wilson's Hussars to expand the influence of Helmar Valasek, leader of Santander's Killers.
